headline.print_headline: Edward Kennedy Jr.’s and Patrick Kennedy’s Remembrances
headline.main: Edward Kennedy Jr.’s and Patrick Kennedy’s Remembrances

docs.lead_paragraph: The following is a transcript of Edward Kennedy Jr.’s remembrance of his father, Edward M. Kennedy, at Our Lady of Perpetual Help Basilica on Saturday, as recorded by CQ Transcriptions.
